author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Really great
review:
Opening;

The piggy coin bank is an incredible set that is also one of the most useful .

The build-

 The build is very nicely shaped the feet are four 4×4 red rounded bricks and a nice face with sausage eye brows , printed eyes and a brick built snout and ears .

In conclusion-

this is a great set that a Lego enthusiast will really appreciate and I 100% recommend it to any Lego fan and I mean any Lego fan .
